### Communication Compliance in Purview #### Overview - **Purpose**: Ensures that company communications adhere to internal policies and regulatory requirements. - **Automated Monitoring**: Uses AI to scan for non-compliant messages in emails, chats, and social media. #### Key Elements - **Policy Definition**: Set up custom rules based on your organization's needs. - **Alerts & Notifications**: Immediate alerts for any detected policy violations. - **Review Process**: Provide a dashboard for compliance officers to review flagged communications. - **Reporting**: Generate detailed compliance reports for audits and reviews. #### Features - **Keyword Tracking**: Identify specific sensitive terms in communications. - **Sentiment Analysis**: Monitor the emotional tone of messages. - **Conversation Clustering**: Group related messages to understand the context of communication. - **Role-based Access**: Assign access rights ensuring data privacy. #### Benefits - **Risk Mitigation**: Reduces the chance of internal policy breaches. - **Regulatory Compliance**: Helps to meet legal obligations. - **Enhanced Transparency**: Increases visibility into internal communications. ### Best Practices - **Regular Updates**: Continuously update compliance policies to reflect current standards. - **Training**: Educate employees on communication compliance requirements. - **Monitoring**: Use dashboards to track compliance performance. - **In-depth Analysis**: Regularly analyze flagged communications for patterns and insights.
